pageContent: Background and purpose: To prospectively evaluate long-term urinary, bowel and sexual function after I-125 brachytherapy for localised prostate cancer using patient administered validated Quality of Life (QoL) instruments.

metaData.source:
Two-year Outcomes Following Focal Laser Ablation of Localized Prostate Cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31100236/
